price: Yinyegeza abantu kubera intuntu n’iceyi yibwira ko yatewe no kwibaruka umwana w’umukobwa, yijijanya imitima ko yokwemera ico ceyi akareka nya mwana agakura, canke ko yomuhamba akiri muzima! Bantu, nimwumve mwumvireho! Ukwomekera kw'ababangikanyamana abana b’abakobwa ku Mana Allah, bakiyitirira abana b’abahungu, ni ingingo mbi cane.
arabic: يَتَوَٰرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ مِن سُوٓءِ مَا بُشِّرَ بِهِۦٓۚ أَيُمۡسِكُهُۥ عَلَىٰ هُونٍ أَمۡ يَدُسُّهُۥ فِي ٱلتُّرَابِۗ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

meta.transliteration: yatawārā mina al-qawmi min sūi mā bushira bihi ayum'sikuhu ʿalā hūnin am yadussuhu fī al-turābi alā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
translations: he has been given good news
